overview: This short unedited film largely documents travel, tourist attractions some of the people encountered during Sir Clarmont Skrineâ€™s time in the region. Highlights within the footage are the spectacular mountainous scenery to be found in Iran, Tomb of Cyrus, Persepolis, the shrine of Imam Reza, Imam Square, Chehel Sotoun, Shah Mosque, Tehran Bazaar, Ctesiphon, the Tomb of Darius and the Blue Mosque.
title: Istanbul - Baghdad - Teheran: 1944-58
